text: Ke ba le kae ba ba neetsweng lotshwao lo? Ke ne ka utlwa gotwe palo ya bone ke dikete di le lekgolo le masome a masome a mane le bone, mo ditsong tsotlhe tsa Iseraele tse di lesome le bobedi, jaaka di rulagantswe fa: Juda 12,000 Rubene 12,000, Gade 12,000, Ashe 12,000, Nafetali 12,000, Manasa 12,000, Simeone 12,000, Lefi 12,000, Isekare 12,000, Sebulane 12,000, Josefa 12,000, Benjamine 12,000.
